commits.content:
import { MapPin, Phone, Clock, Mail } from "lucide-react"; import { Button } from "./ui/button"; const locations = [ { city: "Beirut", country: "Lebanon", address: "ABC Mall, Achrafieh, Beirut", phone: "+961 1 123 456", email: "beirut@bloomdental.lb", hours: "Mon-Fri: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM\nSat: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM", mapUrl: "https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3312.2299804808914!2d35.50953731521013!3d33.88863338065076!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x151f17215880a78f%3A0x729182bae99836b4!2sBeirut%2C%20Lebanon!5e0!3m2!1sen!2s!4v1234567890", }, { city: "Dubai", country: "UAE", address: "Dubai Healthcare City, Building 64", phone: "+971 4 123 4567", email: "dubai@bloomdental.ae", hours: "Sun-Thu: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM\nFri: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM", mapUrl: "https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3608.7326885961564!2d55.33151931499934!3d25.23448758388865!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x3e5f5cb2f3f3f3f3%3A0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f!2sDubai%20Healthcare%20City!5e0!3m2!1sen!2s!4v1234567890", }, ]; export default function Locations() { return (
Visit Us

Our Locations

Two world-class clinics serving patients across the Middle East

{locations.map((location, index) => (
{/* Map */}
{/* Location Details */}

{location.city}

{location.country}

{location.address}

{location.phone}

{location.email}

{location.hours}

))}
); }
